column1: Little Goat Diner////For a first time visit
column2: I wasn't sure where to start. The $20 goat burger was really sounding interesting
column3: but then the waiter mentioned the evening's "blue light special" which was... deep fried pig's tail?! I have never had deep fried pig tail before
column4: but looking at all of the delicious looking plates coming out of the kitchen
column5: I wasn't nervous and took the plunge.
